hero.title: Ângelo Fumagalli
hero.subtitle: Frontend Engineer specializing in Vue.js, React, and TypeScript, with over 15 years of experience transforming ideas into modern, high-impact interfaces.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I am a Frontend Developer based in Pelotas, Brazil. With an analytical and proactive profile, I act not only in execution but also in anticipating problems and proposing creative solutions from the planning phase to deployment. I believe transparency and collaboration are key to assertive deliveries; therefore, I value knowledge sharing, supporting the technical growth of colleagues, and actively participating in the team's decision-making.

My pursuit of excellence is reflected in code quality and attention to detail. Technically, my expertise covers interface coding, mastery of frameworks like Vue.js and React, creation and maintenance of component libraries, as well as WordPress development and implementation of simple APIs. I have a strong commitment to code documentation and layout optimization, ensuring responsiveness, performance, and the best User Experience (UX) across various devices.

items.name: Professional Vue 3 Portfolio
items.description: Personal portfolio developed with Vue 3, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, using Composition API and modern development best practices. Complete internationalization system (vue-i18n), custom design system with HSL variables, and reusable components.
items.impact: Complete migration from React portfolio to Vue 3, demonstrating versatility and mastery of different frameworks. Implementation of robust design system, intersection observers for animations, and scalable component-based architecture.

items.name: Professional React Portfolio
items.description: Personal portfolio developed with React 18, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, implementing modern frontend development best practices. Features complete internationalization system (i18n), responsive design and SEO optimization.
items.impact: Creation of fully responsive and accessible (WCAG) professional showcase with multi-language support (PT/EN), demonstrating frontend development expertise and attention to user experience.
